summary: Identical twins are separated at birth, one becoming a streetwise mechanic, and the other an acclaimed classical concert conductor. Finally meeting in adulthood, they each become mistaken for the other and entangled in each other's world.
cast: Jackie Chan|Maggie Cheung|Teddy Robin Kwan|James Wong|Sylvia Chang|Kirk Wong|David Chiang|Mabel Cheung|Alfred Cheung|Lung Wei Wang|Anthony Chan|Nina Li Chi|Chi Leung 'Jacob' Cheung|David Wu|Philip Chan|Pasan Leung|Chia-Liang Liu|Gordon Chan|Yuen Chor|Jamie Luk|Guy Lai|Eric Tsang|Wei Tung|Hark Tsui|Ringo Lam|See-Yuen Ng|John Woo|Siu-Ming Tsui|Tung Cho 'Joe' Cheung|Peter Ho-Sun Chan|Ricky Chan|Sai-Tang Chan|Tat-Kwong Chan|Kuen Cheung|Wah Cheung|Andy Wing-Keung Chin|Eddie Fong|Hark-On Fung|Yi Ching Fung|James Jim-Si Ha|Keung-Kuen Lai|David Lam|Clara Law|Chi-Ngai Lee|Raymond Lee|Angela Mak|Tai-Kit Mak|Sing-Pui O|Yueming Shen|Francis Sung|Roman Tam|Terry Tong|Yonfan|Anthony Carpio|Dennis Chan|Siu-Tung Ching|Clifton Ko|Rocky Lai|Chris Lei|Chung Chi Li|Chia-Yung Liu|Mars|James McKenzie|Bob Papenbrook|Kirk Thornton|Jing Wong|Wing-Cho Yip
title: Dragones gemelos
